lines.text: Cc: Chan, Koon Wai; Kirk, Joe; Chow, Frankie; Enders, Grant; Wong. Gary; Garrett, Ian
As far as I know, the resourcing concerns the Thai domestic business only since this is where savings on duty
and tax can be made. I don't know if Marketing has any concerns if the duty free and the domestic products
come from different manufacturers, but it may complicate the malter (from an administrative and logistics point
of view) for PTPMl if they also have to produce for the duty free business. Maybe Joe and lan can comment?

full_text:
From:
--Original Message-
Anderegg. Nicolas
Sent:
Wednesday, Decernber 22, 1999 4:56 PM
Cc: Chan, Koon Wai; Kirk, Joe; Chow, Frankie; Enders, Grant; Wong. Gary; Garrett, Ian
To: Voong, Che Yee
Subject:
RE: Thai Duty Free Cigarettes
As far as I know, the resourcing concerns the Thai domestic business only since this is where savings on duty
and tax can be made. I don't know if Marketing has any concerns if the duty free and the domestic products
come from different manufacturers, but it may complicate the malter (from an administrative and logistics point
of view) for PTPMl if they also have to produce for the duty free business. Maybe Joe and lan can comment?
Regards,
2
